column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Where do I start? Cute
column4: desserts and their coffee....so yummy. Only had the chance to try their desserts and coffee
column5: oh my it was good. You can taste the care that the pastry chef puts into creating those cookies. A must try! Also tried their cheesecake
column7: nothing outrageous. Definitely can't go without trying their coffee or any of their speciality coffees.
